website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful stitching on a practical boot.
pros: A practical boot for walking through pastures as well as wearing in the city
Also comes with a brown stitching
cons: Boots with brown stitching have pointed toes, while boots with blue stitching are squared

customer_reviews.title: so your feet and legs better be very very thin and fine boned
customer_reviews.text: Lovely boots...however there is no way a size 9.5 foot will fit down the shaft/sleeve of the boot...the shaft/sleeve is roughly the circumference of a grapefruit...so your feet and legs better be very very thin and fine boned. I will be returning the boots. I would give way more stars for just the style and look of the boot...but with the small size I have to bump it down. Ladies with wide feet or calves steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of the boots look like they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the boots look like they are well made and they are comfortable. Only thing is when they was shipped my boots came kind of dented and the dent hits my ankle bone which is very uncomfortable. Also I order the wide and they fit like a normal boot. Wish they was a tad bit wider and I order size 7.5 normally I wear size 7 these fit just like all my other size 7 boots. I wanted a boot a tad loose I did not receive.
customer_reviews.author: Emmie

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, but TIGHT instep!!
customer_reviews.text: These wide width Justin Stampede Collection Boots are beautiful and well made, but even going with the wide width, size 8C, they are still very tight in the upper instep... Not only difficult to get on, which I could live with, but extremely tight around the top of the foot. I need to figure out how to stretch these or they're worthless to me. IF I get them to stretch, I'll upgrade the review, but for now, I have to go with comfort over style. I don't understand why when manufacturing boots, they don't stretch them, because everyone complains of the same thing, breaking them in! IF anyone has any helpful tips for stretching, much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: They run big, so I had to exchange for a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered these in the same size as my Justin Gypsy boots. They arrived, and they were gorgeous, but HUGE!!! So I sent them back to exchange for a smaller size. I read reviews saying to order a size down from what your normally wear. I went to the local boot store and tried on a size down in the same boot. That seemed to fit better. So I returned to Amazon to order them in the full size down. I received the smaller pair and they're still big! They're comfortable but they feel odd and clumsy on my feet. It's hard to explain. I probably should've ordered one and a half sizes down.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 6/19/17 update: Now that I've work these two times I can update properly.. they give me blisters around my ankles, they are NOT wide calve in comparison to others I've now tried on even though they state they are. One of the loops to pull the boot up by is falling apart, sticky, and I wire is popping out. I think these were a reject/lemon pair which is why they were being sold here for $40 cheaper than Boot Barn. I'm sad because they are cute but I'm disappointed. Old initial post: They're cute, but they are suppose to be wide calve and they're still a little tight around the calve.
customer_reviews.author: SicilianMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8.5 in boots so after reading the other reviews on these boots I ordered a size 8 C US. They fit great except they are just a bit too wide. Should have gone with the 8 M US and they would be a perfect fit. Besides that, they have been comfortable to wear right out of the box. Good quality boot and buying them from Amazon I saved about $37.00. Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: MBN

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect! I love the style, color and fit! I purposely ordered a wide width which is a first for me. I wanted a more roomy toe box as I spend an lot of time in my boots! This allows me to wear a thicker sock and insert an arch support on a particular day if I want. I really love these boots! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Killeen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pair of boots made of quality material and packaged in plastic. The box they came in was not a justin brand box but instead a generic plain white boot box, but they are in fact authentic justin boots
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: these would be my favorite boots but they are way too big
customer_reviews.text: these would be my favorite boots but they are way too big, now I am afraid to order Justin boots. Other styles of Justin boots run small, these run big???? And I really love them, just afraid to order. They should put down how long the foot bed is....11 inches or 10.5 or what ever it is for the size being ordered. Very disapointed. I have to wear 2 pairs of really thick socks to make them fit. Trust me...in this heat they are very HOT to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are gorgeous! I got a compliment the first day wearing them! The stitching is really bright and stands out. I suggest wearing them inside for a few hours, then only a few hours a day to break them in. They are VERY large for the size indicated. I normally wear an 8/8.5 tennis shoe because I have very wide feet. After reading reviews of how large they are, I ordered a size 7. They are very comfortable on the width, but I think I could have even went a half size smaller. I recommend ordering at least a FULL size smaller than what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Martyce

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these boots and I have to say...they are awesome! Soft leather, insole with arch support and a nice flexible sole with rubber, which really helps traction. I purchased these for my grandchild and she also loved them! She wears a 9.5 and they were just a little larger. However, with socks they fit her perfectly. She actually said that they are more comfortable with a little extra room. Thanks for such a quality boot and the wonderful 2 day shipping with Prime!! Happily to say, there was also a 20% off code listed when I purchased them...so be sure and read carefully to see if there is an offer to be had.
customer_reviews.author: WV Gal

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: These are a little large but I think a size under would have been borderline. I ordered my natural size however I googled a size chart that was based on foot measurement. My left boot has inner stitching at the calf for the decor but the thread is thick inside and scratches at the calf. I put some cotton over it and that solved the problem. Also the color is darker than expected - more like a chocolate and blue. These are made in China ( I didn't know that when I ordered would have preferred USA) Overall I still enjoy the boots and do plan to order more from Justin's
customer_reviews.author: happywife

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: These boots look really nice. I was surprised how much when I took them out of the box. I ordered my regular size and they fit perfectly in the toe area it's just in the heel area they are a bit large. I haven't tried them with think socks yet. I'm hoping that takes care of the problem because otherwise they are perfect and My jeans fit perfectly down inside them.
customer_reviews.author: Speedbuggy

customer_reviews.title: as others have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: they don't look like i thought they would in the advertisement. they look better in person... or boot. i love them. they are comfortable on the inside and the rubber sole is kind to my ankles and knees. the sole doesn't absorb as much impact as a wooden sole. i just couldn't believe a real leather boot was being sold for $100. most vendors (and dept stores) sell synthetic crap for $100 or more. plastic BOOTS not meant for rain. what's the point? so, if this vendor still has these in stock, grab a pair.
customer_reviews.author: just a regular gal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these boots 5 stars because they are absolutely gorgeous. With that being said, I think it would be smart to heed the sizing warnings of other reviewers. These do run quite large. I wear a 9 in tennis shoes and an 8.5-9 in boots, so I ordered an 8.5. These are way too loose on my feet. I went to a local shoe store that stocks Justin boots, and tried on an 8, and they fit perfectly. I'm exchanging mine through Amazon for an 8. Do not hesitate on the beauty or quality of these boots in person, but do think carefully about your size!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: These boots are made for walking
customer_reviews.text: I am a shapely gal and that comes with full calves. Thes boots, while a little snug in the calves, are not uncomfortable. I agree with the others- they run 1/2-1 full size large, but for me that's just fine. The stitching is lovely and I can't wait to get some dirt on them. I ordered them from Amazon since they were far less than they were elsewhere. I like the rubber soles as they're prety quiet and I don't worry so much about slipping on dirt and gravel. I would definitely recommend these to friends. I may even pick up another pair myself.
customer_reviews.author: LadyD6107

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots as a gift for my sister's birthday. She really likes them. She said that there was plenty of room in the footbed and were quite comfortable right away. She did comment that they were almost too big , but that she can wear thick, comfy boot socks and they will be fine. I selected this particular style because she has problems with her toes and I thought the square toe would be better than a pointed toe. Worked out great! However, I might suggest going down a half size for most people.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Bad all around
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I got a half a size smaller than what I normally wear and they kinda for good. The left boot fit normal and the right one looked odd, almost as if I got two left boots but not quite. Also, they are wayyyyy darker than the photo and the teal doesn't pop like it does in the photo. And there is a warning label on them about the material causing cancer. Anyways, I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: These boots are awsome!
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews before I bought these and went down a whole size. All my other boots I've owned I wear a size 7 but I got a 6 and they fit perfectly in length. They are a little wide but I have very skinny feet and they swim in everything so this wasn't a surprise for me. This is also the first time I have bought a square toed boot and I have to say I'm likin' the style of them with my jeans. The colors are a bit darker than they are in the picture, but otherwise these seem like they will last me a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I needed boots that looked pretty to wear for my wedding but also ones that ...
customer_reviews.text: I am getting married in April and I am not the heel wearing kind of girl. I needed boots that looked pretty to wear for my wedding but also ones that I could wear on a regular basis. These are perfect for both! They go with anything I wear and they are extremely comfortable. It takes a good while to break them in but unlike most boots it was not an uncomfortable process.
customer_reviews.author: Haley B.

customer_reviews.title: These boots run large but are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing an 8-8 1/2 for the last few years, although I always wore 7 1/2 until aging took over and feet spread (I'm 63). I ordered my normal 8 and it was huge so I gave them to my daughter and ordered another pair that was 1/2 size smaller, which worked out great. However, both my daughter and I also bought several pairs of boots at a local store and ALL of them were similarly large so we both had to downsize a 1/2 size. We concluded that either they're making boots bigger or both of our feet are simultaneously shrinking!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta K. Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: durability of Justin with the style of Ariat
customer_reviews.text: i bought these boots for my girlfriend's birthday present and she loves them! they are on the large side so make sure you get the 1/2-1 size smaller than you normally wear. we looked at 50+different boots trying to find a pair that she liked and that fit correctly. these fit the bill. i suggest you try them on before you buy them just to be sure you get the correct size. they seam to be pre-broken in and my girlfriend says they are comfy right out of the box. plus they look good. I think they are a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Frisco

customer_reviews.title: Love the stitching!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots The stitching is great. I ordered a 1/2 smaller than I normally wear and the boot was still sliding up and down on my heel - Amazon was awesome and worked with me to get another 1/2 size smaller by the time I needed them thou. The full size smaller than i normally wear fit great once they're on, they do require some time and wiggling to get them on and off. I am very satisfied with the boots look and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kari McKee

customer_reviews.title: ... not a five because it hits just a bit funny at the ankle but I'm hoping when they're broken ...
customer_reviews.text: A 4 and not a five because it hits just a bit funny at the ankle but I'm hoping when they're broken in it won't be a problem. I usually wear a 6W but when with a 6 1/2W to be safe so that may be why they're a bit loose. They are however wide enough which is awesome!!!! Haven't walked hours in them yet so can't quite say how they'll be over the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S

customer_reviews.title: Great 👢 boots...!
customer_reviews.text: I have old arthritic feet - these wide square toes allow me to wear these boots comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Waters

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable stylish boot without too much flare
customer_reviews.text: First pair of cowgirl boots that fit comfortable at every aspect of my foot. I have narrow, high arch, and bone spurs. These are great. I did order a whole size smaller and they are perfect. I normally wear 9-9.5 and I ordered 8.5. Still room for thick socks, but not to loose with thin socks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: order:excited recieve:Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: They are more of a chocolate than a tan like they appear in the picture but I like them even more because of that. They definitely run big though, I thought I ordered an 8 but apparently ordered a 7, but hey I'm usually 8.5 and they fit great.I was unsure about the rubber sole in person but after getting them out of the box and walking around in them I've found I really like grip from the rubber and it does not take away from the overall look of the boot in any way. Super happy and can't wait to wear these beautiful boots out!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfy Boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews that these boots were a tad large. Went to a store near me and tried on a pair that was a full size smaller than what I take. After walking around in them for 5 min they were pinching. I wear custom orthotics, No problem with them. I then came home and ordered a pair 1/2 size smaller than what I wear but a little wider. PERFECT!!! DID NOT WANT TO TAKE THEM OFF!!!! Plenty of toe room. Plenty of room if I need to wear a heavier sock. I also love the style.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I got these last week and love the color and look of them. Not sure if it is the leather or not but looked like there were a couple of scuff marks on them. The only other complaint I have is that they fit beautifully length wise after reading a lot of comments saying to order a half a size to a full size under your normal size. They seem a bit wide on the top part of my foot. They are very comfortable right out of the box as well.
customer_reviews.author: BigWayneO

customer_reviews.title: They run a full size big.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these boots on in a store in my normal 6.5 & they were huge. I normally wear a 6.5 or 7 in most shoes & have problems finding shoes for narrow feet & high arches. So I read the reviews that they run big & chanced ordering them a whole size small. I got the 5.5 & they fit great! Was hesitant to go a whole size smaller, but glad I did. They are very comfy, & I hope they hold up. Not sure how well they would fit wide feet though.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: too wide
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10. I bought these in a 10, and they were way too big. A boot should fit snug across the foot, but be roomy in the toe, since the foot will stretch, but the toe will not. I easily sent them back and got a 9 1/2. Still too wide. I've tried on boots at the Justin store, and the B width fits. This B width was huge. I was afraid to go down to a 9. I returned them and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JSK

customer_reviews.title: Made her day!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter. We saw them out shopping and I wanted to look around. Amazon had the best price--$40 less than in the store and she could order the wide width. Add the super-saver shipping= wonderful. The fit and quality were good. She wore them right to the barn. My only concern was the shipping. It was delivered Fed ex Smartpost and actually didn't arrive. Amazon customer service was great! They helped me trace it and also helped reorder it. I so appreciated that.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed Boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 7 did not fit so got a 6 which was too wide in the heel and was not happy with arch. Ordered boots from other brands and nothing felt good enough to keep. My advice is to go to your local western style boot store, try on different brands and then compare on line prices with those on line. Had I done this it would have saved lots of trips to UPS!
customer_reviews.author: C in Yakima

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots but made me feel like I had duck ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots but made me feel like I had duck feet. I ordered the 10 wide thinking it would fit better because I have a high instep.. but it was too wide I guess an a little too big.. it just didn't feel or look right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: justin boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots...they ate very comfortable and almost feel like your wearing sneakers. They are exactly what I was looking for. Good thing i read the comments on them 1st. It is true to order a size smaller then your reg. shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful! Nice
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful! Nice, rich brown color, beautiful teal stitching. I wear 9.5-10, depending on the shoe, and wide width. I ordered a 9 c/d. Perfect fit! Very comfortable. I have large calves but these boots fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Cool Boot
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. I have a wide foot and these fit beautifully and are comfortable to boot (no pun intended). I went a half size bigger and they still didn't look too big or too clunky.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Calkins

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite boots! Order a size smaller!
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn an 8 in women's cowgirl boots but these I needed a 7 and still had a little room for warm socks. That being said, they're my new favorite boots! Not quite the same quality as my tony lamas but they are so cute for wearing out on the town! Also they came in as a chocolate brown, very dark. I love them but keep in mind leather comes in all shades and every pair is a different color.
customer_reviews.author: MWebster

customer_reviews.title: LOVE JUSTIN BOOTS!
customer_reviews.text: Justin's are the only boots I will buy! Great quality and perfect fit!!! This is my third pair and I swear by them! I usually wear a size 8 1/2 regular shoe but in Justin boots I wear a size 8. The sole is rubber which is awesome..no slipping! Built well with quality leather that lasts. At first they may fit a bit snug but leather conforms to your foot and softens the more you wear it....great boots I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are very attractive and comfortable and look great. I normally wear a 7 but they were way too big. The 6 1⁄2 fits well in the toe but the heel is wide and slips on my foot. I didn't try the 6 as I thought they would cramp in the toes. I am wearing extra socks to compensate for the loose heels.
customer_reviews.author: sgmeng

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but egregiously large
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful and comfortable, but...... Extremely, ridiculously large. I read reviews that said size ran big, so I followed their advice and sized one down. Still clown like, they are so big!!!!! Beautiful, but I'm returning. I don't have any confidence the sizing will be correct, so I don't plan to re buy. Sad
customer_reviews.author: barefootcharlies74

customer_reviews.title: Wide width available!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love them! Although I'm a slim person, I have wide feet and a high instep (high arch and top of foot above arch is high). It is very hard to find comfortable boots. I spent many hours on Internet looking and found these were the best. The look great and exceeded my high expectations. I usually buy a size 8 in a boot but bought a 7.5 C and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: Different but better
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a whole size bigger than typical footwear. Believe the reviews. The brown is much deeper and richer than the photo reflects, in a good way. Leather naturally lightens over time so these will only get better. The stitching is more subtle than I expected, but that turned out to be a good thing too. Overall, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly love the boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots!!! They are well made & super comfortable! I have problems with my feet at times & needing a good amount of support. & these definatly offer the support i need! They very cute. The stitching is everything i had hoped. The only thing. Is that they seem a little big. But as this is my first pair of cowgirl boot... Maybe they are suppose to be just a bit loose. So we shall see. I still love them & hoping just breaking them in a bit(not that they need a lot of breaking in) will help. They are great boots!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for her Christmas she loves them she is breaking them in at the moment, in other words wearing them as much as possible. She thought they were just a little on the big side but with the toes she decided she could not have worn a smaller size, she is an 81/2 but I bought her the 9 because of the pointed toe. They look much better than the picture we were very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loves them! Listen to other though and get the smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my gf for her birthday and she absolutely loves them, luckily I read other reviews and got a smaller size though. She usually wears a 6.5, and her feet are tiny so I figured I'd go even smaller than others and get the size 5, and they fit perfectly for her. This was also the best price by far so that was also a plus when buying these. I definitely suggest these for any country girl.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: They are super cute too - I would recommend trying on a ...
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter wears these all the time. She LOVES them. They are super cute too - I would recommend trying on a pair at the Boot Barn or somewhere like that to ensure your size... then order what fits online. Better prices online anyway. :)
customer_reviews.author: msaonika

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots. I usually size up when I get boots, but these fit spot on with a 9, although somewhat wide. So they are a little loose, but perfect with a thicker sock. Very comfortable. The leather is a bit stiff, but seems to be softening every time I wear them, so I guess there is definitely a breaking in period. Very good quality boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Boots are beautiful. I ordered my normal size per the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Boots are beautiful. I ordered my normal size per the other reviews but they were too big, unfortunately they don't have them in a smaller size so I will have to go to another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: natc

customer_reviews.title: In addition to being too large, I should have ...
customer_reviews.text: In addition to being too large, I should have listened to most of the reviewers, the boots were different shades. I'm not sure if it was just the oil or not, but one was very dark, and the other was very light. Also, there was a visible defect, about the size of a quarter, on the side of one of the boots where you could there was an attempt to cover it.
customer_reviews.author: DAM

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable boot, very soft and good for walking all day. Did find the sizing somewhat off for my feet. I wear a size 6, but ordered a 6 1/2 to be able to wear thick socks. After a few wearings the boots stretched quite a bit, now they feel too large. I will order a smaller size if I order another pair from this company. Good quality boot for the price paid. Would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: lu-lu

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how large these boots ran. I typically wear a 9.5 to 10 and so I ordered these in a 9.5. They are pretty big. I am sure a 9 would fit so I would order a half size smaller than normal. They also came with the top folded in and bent. I was surprised at how unfinished they looked, and not the normal Justin quality I have witnessed in the past. Probably why these are so discounted.
customer_reviews.author: Wendie E. Murray

customer_reviews.title: These are enormous!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They look like they are very well made and I really wanted to be able to wear them. I ordered a women's size 5 (as I usually do) and they feel like they are probably a men's 5. The product fit states that it "runs small" but I'm not sure how that can be because I tried these on with thick woolen socks and my feet were swimming in them. Sadly, a 5 is the smallest they go so I have had to choose another kind of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting, comfortable, durable. Been wearing the same brand and style since I tried them 7 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: DLL

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable! The support is great and they clean up ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for everything, work and leisure. They are so comfortable! The support is great and they clean up well. I bought a leather cleaner and conditioner. I have had these boots almost a year. I wear them to work in the yard and they still look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Around the ankles are larger then i expected, also then they were boxed one of the boots has a crease on the inside ankle that makes wearing them quite painful. Also the heel looked taller in the photo , it's about a half inch shorter then what I thought it was going to be. However the color and the stitching is just what I was looking for, for my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Davis

customer_reviews.title: I was very satisfied. It is of good quality and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a Justin boot and I was hesitant since I was making my purchase online. I was very satisfied. It is of good quality and fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: Im an italian girl and I bought this product from amazon.com because in Italy this product it's very expensive. I recived boots in record time! Only three days. Fantastic Amazon! I Love these boots! They are so pretty and comfy. Like everyone else said, they run too big.​ Several reviews stated that they run 1/2 size bigger and other stated that they run a full size or more. So, I measured my foot length and I compared the result with this size chart:  In Italy my size is equivalent to 8.5/9B US. Since I measured my foot, I choose 6.5 B!!! They are perfect!! Definitively, they runs about two 1/2 size down.
customer_reviews.author: Gaia

customer_reviews.title: Always love Justins
customer_reviews.text: Justin boots are great quality with good traction, a sturdy build, and high quality. The arch support in these boots is the best out of all the shoes I own. They are comfortable, just need a tiny bit of breaking in to loosen up the leather. I recommend buying half a size to a full size smaller than your normal street shoe size because they will loosen up and stretch as you wear them.
customer_reviews.author: cowbyluvr

customer_reviews.title: I cannot tell you how much I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how much I love these boots. I have had them now for 5 years and they still look new. Everyone who sees me in them always compliment on how much they like them.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L. King

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! They are wide toe so I usually wear a 10 and I got a 9 in these boots and they fit perfect! I have plenty of room in them and the sole is so comfortable! The pattern is just beautiful and the dark color is a nice accent to the stitching. Can't wait to wear these more! Fabulous boot for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: rlc22Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Size runs big
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews stated that they run 1/2 size bigger so I ordered an 8 since I usually wear size 8 1/2. I should have gotten a full size smaller and gotten a 7 1/2. It seems that a lot of people with wide feet like this boot, but I have narrow feet and I feel like I was all over the place in them. I think my foot is more meant for the round toe instead of the square, and I exchanged them for a different pair. They were very nice looking though and I had to really think about it before sending them back
customer_reviews.author: Karin F. Doheny

customer_reviews.title: Love LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love LOVE these boots. EVERY time I wear them, I get compliments. I'm usually an 81/2-9 and cannot wear enclosed shoes of any type for long (all day) periods. However these are very comfortable, more than any of my other shoes. Someone returned a size 8, so I took a chance, and got an even bigger discount, and surprise, surprise! -they fit perfectly! They are very well made, I will buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Coyotebleu

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, run 1/2 size small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots originally for my daughter and bought this second pair for her twin. They are beautiful but run a half size too big. Amazon's price was terrific.
customer_reviews.author: M. Church

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel of these boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit better than expected,have not worn a western boot in many years.So comfortable, I hate to take them off, and I'm an Athletic shoe person.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: These boots are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable boots. I got my normal size, and its just a little roomy, but that is totally fine, because I like to wear wool socks, and the comfy rubber soles prevent any would- be sliding. Gorgeous detail along the sides, and can be worn with a lot of different outfits. The leather is also high quality, so sure to last throughout the years. I love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: I really love my boots
customer_reviews.text: I really love my boots. Super nice quality! The only thing I'll complain about is the sizing. I'm always a 10 or 9 1/2. So I order a 9 1/2 the first time. Wayyyyyy too big! Returned them and got a 9. Still too big! I needed them for a wedding I was in so I couldn't return them again to get a 8 1/2 in time. But if I got this brand again, I would go down that small. Other wise, I love them! And the retuning process was very easy :)
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boots but run large
customer_reviews.text: I read previous reviews stating that these boots run large and to buy a 1/2 size to full size smaller than normal. I generally wear a size 11 & have fairly wide feet. I ordered a size 10.5 and they fit perfectly! Gorgeous boots and wide enough to fit a wider calf.
customer_reviews.author: BadgerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but run BIG!
customer_reviews.text: Lovvve them! They DEFINITELY run BIG! I ordered 8.5 and they are at least one size too big! Already reordered a 7.5! They are comfy and wide feet friendly! 🎉
customer_reviews.author: Alicha

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! You can't find anything better for the price. They are so comfortable and cute. I get so many compliments on them. They run about a full size too big. I usually wear a nine and I had to order an eight. The width is perfect and they have a great arch, which I was surprised by.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to purchase some cowgirl boots for a while. Amazon is always my first place to look for things -- these boots are even cuter in person. Love the turquoise stitching with the brown leather. They felt terrific as soon as I put them on, and they are so comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChipShotLady

customer_reviews.title: My fiancee finally got her dream boots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my fiancee for Christmas on Amazon because our local Tractor Supply Store ran out of them. She loves walking out in these boots whenever we go out. Her only complaint is that they are tough to get off of her feet, but then, what cowboy boot isn't? Beautiful and comfy cowboy boots...
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J. Deibel

customer_reviews.title: I really love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I really love these boots. They re comfortable and they look great and conceal how skinny my ankles are. Downside is I dont know what sicks to wear with them so they seen kinda big. Make sure you know exactly what size u are
customer_reviews.author: Hot Choco

customer_reviews.title: Best riding/barn boots.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Stampedes, they fit perfectly and are replacing a pair of 10 yr old hard used Justin boots. When you take good care of them, they last forever. won't wear anything but....they were also delivered so fast,I didn't have time to mourn the old pair. Justin's forever more!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Hoffert

customer_reviews.title: Justin Boots
customer_reviews.text: My Justin boots are very comfortable and fit perfectly. I love the style, and am very happy with Justin. Other boot brands fall apart too easily, or the heels are too hard making for an uncomfortable walk. These are solidly made, nice rubber soles, I'll stick with Justin from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and comfortable! It only took a couple of hours to break them in. They run a bit big though. I normally wear 11 wide and just barely fit. Based on other reviews here and on country outfitter I ordered 10 1/2 wide and they fit perfectly after being worn for a couple hours and stretching (as they should). I've been wearing them for about a week now and they're great. Side note though: if you wear 9 or under and don't require a wide tractor supply has them online for like $75
customer_reviews.author: I <3 Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and boot but came weird
customer_reviews.text: Justin boots run a tad big on their own but fit the way they should! When I got them one boot was more beat up than the other. Not sure why I’m not too worried but it didn’t look new
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I Loved these boots on the showroom floor
customer_reviews.text: Luckily,I went down to our local western store to find what I wanted. I Loved these boots on the showroom floor. I tried on my normal size and the size is off on these boots. I wear a size 8.5 and I had to fit into a size 7.5. A whole size difference. I even fit into a size 7.Wow! So, I knew that before I ordered online and they arrived as a perfect fit. I recommend you try them on at your local western store for the right fit. It's worth the effort as these boots are extremely comfortable and well made. I'm a Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Be forewarned - I am not a real cowgirl!
customer_reviews.text: I am a suburban lady who loves being out in nature. I also love the look for boots. These are perfect! They are super comfy and cute! I ordered a half size down from what I normally wear and they are still a little big, but some nice thick socks make them perfect! I can't wait to find the perfect dress to wear during the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williams

customer_reviews.title: Definitely order one size smaller!
customer_reviews.text: Reluctantly, I ordered one size smaller but glad I did! I normally wear a 7.5 or 8, mostly to accommodate my wide foot. If I didn't have one foot wider than another I could wear a 7 most times. So I ordered the 6.5 C. The length is perfect and so is the width!
customer_reviews.author: mimimiller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THEM THEY RUN A LITTLE BIG NOT MUCH BUT CUTE
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Love This Boot
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot but I should have paid more attention to the reviews regarding sizing. I normally wear a 6.5 but could have easily ordered a 6. They will be OK with thick socks. I love the support for the arch. Very comfortable boot.
customer_reviews.author: MGP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boot
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the boots, however they were huge. I normally wear a size 11 shoe, I purchased them in an 11 and they were really big. I did not return that pair, just resold them locally. I recently ordered a half size smaller and they too were really big. I am giving up on owning this beautiful pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: wendyb

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I tried these boots on in the store (7 1/2 B) and found them a lot cheaper on Amazon so I ordered them. The ones in the store fit perfectly, if anything they were a bit snug but since boots stretch they were perfect. The ones I received (which were also 7 1/2 B) fit more like an 8 1/2. They were much too big for me. So maybe there is just an inconsistency in the boots from Justin or something, I am not sure. I will be returning these and getting a smaller pair.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of boots and I love them. I usually wear 9-9.5 after reading some of the reviews I decided to go with the 9B, which I'm glad I did the 9.5 would have been way too big, I could have even done a 8.5B. So I would recommend going at least 1/2 size down from your normal size. There're very comfortable just took a bit to work in, they definitely do stretch out once you break em in. Shipping was really fast I was quit impressed. overall I'm very happy with these boots and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: taytay

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Big
customer_reviews.text: I have always had issues finding boots that fit. I ordered my usual size after reading the reviews and hearing they run large. I wear really thick socks with my boots, especially working outside. With the socks on, they fit perfect without cutting off circulation to my toes. They are really cute and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Z

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the most comfortable I've ever owned. I had tried a pair on in a local store, so I knew I had to buy a full size smaller than what I normally wear. I got them just in time before we left on vacation, wore them all day long and my feet never hurt a bit. You can't go wrong with these boots, just make sure you order a size smaller than what you wear (I wear a 10 and ordered a 9)
customer_reviews.author: abstewart

customer_reviews.title: great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy boots, I was so glad to see that they had wide sizes, which are really hard to find in stores. I got these boots cause I think they are cute, but also for a wedding, and they are wonderful to wear, and have been worthy of walking a couple of miles.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews and decided to go with 1/2 size larger than I normally wear. They fit great and look wonderful. I waterproofed them and they look great!! They fit great around the ankle too, not too loose. If you plan to wear socks, I'd use thin ones.
customer_reviews.author: PP6592

customer_reviews.title: love love love these boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots. Her friends love these boots. We were in a boots store looking for boots for my husband and a couple of girls came up and asked my daughter where she got these boots. Very comfortable and fit exactly as expected. She wants another pair.
customer_reviews.author: chellet_21

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots...Very well made. The only complaints I have is that they are a little bit big, and the leather was turning in on my ankle bones. It was very painful and I had bruises after only wearing them for an hour. I fixed it by pouring water in them and reshaping them; After that, they fit fine. But otherwise, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: C. lastname

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality and look of boots just a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of Justin Boots and I order the same size as my other ones I had but these move up and down when I walk in them and that is with thick socks on also. Love the quality and look of boots just a little bit to big. I even went to the local boot store and tried on the same boots and the same size before I order them but were still to big when I received them. I recommend spending the extra $20 and buy them at a store where you can try them on because they are all made different even if it is the same boot and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Batts

customer_reviews.title: Boots run big, look nice
customer_reviews.text: The boots definitely run big. They work OK for me with my thickest winter socks on. They look good. I didn't want to go into the hassle of returning and getting a size down. But, that's probably what I would recommend to others. One size down. Or wear thick socks. They are above average in comfort and functionality. Good to walk in during harsh weather. Haven't failed me during the "Polar vortex" this year. Yet.
customer_reviews.author: Oindree Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: beautiful boots, my fiancée will be getting these boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, beautiful boots, my fiancée will be getting these boots for Christmas. I can't wait to see her open them. Prompt shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel reeves Mann

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: first new boots in 30 years and I was surprised at how well they fit and wore 'em all day; no problem. love 'em
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Quick Delivery !!
customer_reviews.text: These boots came in two days after ordered !!! I was so surprised. the smell of new leather is overwhelming good - but i am a little partial :) Although this is a christmas present (whis is week away) I had to write a review because I am so pleased so far !! I will send another review after we try them on and deal with Customer Service - but hopefully we will not need to!
customer_reviews.author: monika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my bride to wear at our wedding. She says she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Justin boots
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this boot. As always with Justin it has great arch support something i have to have because of foot pain. They wear great, perfect height and love the aged leather coloring. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting these boots for a while, so I saw them on Amazon now I have them , and I LOVE THEM!! I normally wear 8 1/2 but I ordered an 8 because the run a little big . They are so comfortable I wear them everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!! Don't miss out!!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I wear a size 9W and the 8.5W was perfect! The fit is so comfortable I was shocked :) The best part is that these boots actually fit my huge calves!! So glad I purchased them :))))))
customer_reviews.author: Amber brubaker

product_meta.title: Justin Boots Women's 12" Stampede Boot
product_meta.description:
Whether you're into roping and rodeo or just itching to let your inner cowgirl out to play, the Stampede from Justin Boots has you covered. This fantastic leather look features gorgeous stitching and finely tooled overlays for a look that’s feminine and just a little bit rough and ready. Built with proprietary comfort technology with a tractioned technical western rubber sole, this fine boot is every bit as capable as it is good looking.

The story of Justin Boots began in 1879, when H.J. Justin moved to Spanish Fort, Texas to become a boot repairman. He was a quick study, with an eye and talent for boot making and launched his own company, Justin Boots. Every pair of Justin Boots is a salute to the spirit of independence, hard work and authenticity of the cowboy.
